strIntroduction: 從那霸市出發只要20分鐘！超夢幻慶良間群島，被CHIBISHI海域中的珊瑚群包圍，白淨無瑕的無人島『KUEFU島』！你一定不能錯過！

strIntroduction: No.1 snorkelling choice in Okinawa Blue Cave! It is a very safe and suitable snorkelling option especially for non-swimmers and snorkelling beginners! All participants will be given a life jacket, as well as a coach that will be by your side to assist you. We also offer snorkelling equipment for children that are age 5 or above! During fish feeding time, all baits will also be provided! Make the most of it for your Okinawa trip!
strTitle: Blue Cave Snorkelling – suitable option for beginners! (Includes Mandarin speaking coach and free professional photos taken)

strIntroduction: Depart from Umeda/Namba/JR Kyoto, head to several popular tourist spots! Feel free to get on our comfortable bus, then your schedule for today 0%→100%✨✨

strIntroduction: Experience a thrilling but relaxing adventure, a therapeutic ocean view from above the sky to down under into the magical underwater world. This will be one of your most memorable summer getaway!

strIntroduction: Spend an exciting sea tour at Itoman Bibi Beach! It has been selected as one of the most popular beaches within the Southern Okinawa region. strIntroduction: 來到沖繩，要不要試試沖繩特有的民俗服裝＂琉裝＂呢？華麗的琉裝跟和服又有點不太一樣！KKday為您準備了到沖繩也可以大變身的簡易體驗行程，還可以選擇穿上後可以到外面逛街喔！

strIntroduction: 不可思議的Segway，又叫做平衡車，完全靠體重來前後左右移動，只要稍加練習不管是誰都可以駕馭喔！跟著經驗豐富的導遊一起在沖繩世界的Segway車道兜風吧！
strTitle: 【沖繩文化世界】segway賽格威體驗（贈送體驗攝影影片）

strIntroduction: 在沖繩待的時間很短暫，卻又想豐富體驗沖繩的人文風情與自然美景嗎？ KKday觀光巴士帶您去！從沖繩南部的知念岬開始，到當地信仰聖地齋場御嶽，最後帶您到新原海灘享受沖繩的美麗海景！讓您沖繩之旅充實無比！
strTitle: 【沖繩短遊】沖繩南部半日遊（齋場御嶽、知念岬、新原海灘）

strIntroduction: What is the secret that is attracting everyone from all over the world to pay a visit to Disneyland? No matter how old you are! We are very certain that you will not want to miss out the chance of seeing your favourite Disney characters! What are you waiting for? Place Tokyo Disney Resort into your trip agenda!
strTitle: 《Best Price!》Tokyo Disney eTicket Passport: 2-Day (Disneyland / DisneySea)

strIntroduction: KKday 獨家企劃・7-9月期間限定！富士山麓 3 天 2 夜露營！久違的陽光與青草香；壯麗的富士山與滿天的星空。來吧！今年夏天和家人相約日本露營去。

strIntroduction: 豪斯登堡三大品質保證飯店！獨具荷蘭文藝氣息、設施獨特且多樣化，絕對帶給您不一樣的日式歐洲度假氛圍！！
strTitle: 《豪斯登堡住宿》阿姆斯特丹大飯店Hotel Amsterdam 3人住宿（設計師房型／禁煙）
